name: Michael Cetrulo
body:
Welcome to Michael Cetrulo's homepage, here you'll find information about myself, my services and contact details.

You can access my full CV at [bit.ly/cv-michael-cetrulo](http://bit.ly/cv-michael.cetrulo) as an online document or in PDF format [here](https://docs.google.com/document/export?format=pdf&id=1xfDZywtlBzZdTLUw1BzdiSrMBIxzT6Iwhah2hSO0xjc&token=AC4w5VhqonYiK3HmLNqzcbch21-UqtPiNw%3A1443036698886).

I also maintain a technical blog at [blog2samus.tumblr.com](http://blog2samus.tumblr.com/).

Cheers!

## About me

I'm a Software Architect from [Uruguay](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uruguay), currently working as an independent contractor and part of the [Toptal](http://www.toptal.com/resume/michael-cetrulo#hire-only-tested-developers) network of freelancers.

I've been a speaker at some conferences including PyCON UY '12, PyCON FI '14 and attended a few more, I'm also an active participant of the local meetups and co-organizer of the [Montevideo Freelancers Meetup](http://www.meetup.com/Montevideo-Freelancers-Meetup/).

As an Open Source enthusiast I've made small contributions to projects such as [CPython](https://www.python.org/), [Apache Storm](https://storm.apache.org/), [Scrapy](http://scrapy.org/) and a few others. There's also some personal projects that you can find on my [Github account](https://github.com/git2samus).

## My work

For the most part of my career I've been involved on Web Development and Web-related projects such as Screen Scraping, APIs, etc. and even ventured on some DevOps tasks but my core skill is being a Full-Stack Web Developer leaning on the Backend side.

The last few years of my career I've got involved on BigData projects with frameworks such as [Hadoop](https://hadoop.apache.org/), [Storm](https://storm.apache.org/) and some more and I'm now getting interested in some Machine Learning problems and technologies.

I'm proficient in the [Python](https://www.python.org/) and [Ruby](https://www.ruby-lang.org/) programming languages, which are the ones I use more often; I'm also skilled on [JavaScript](https://www.javascript.com/), [PHP](https://secure.php.net/) and [Java](https://www.java.com/).

I'm interested in functional programming as well, having some knowledge of [Erlang](http://www.erlang.org/) and [Clojure](http://clojure.org/). 

## My services

I'm offering my services as an independent contractor/consultant on an hourly basis through a legally registered company here in Uruguay.

I accept full-time and part-time offers but I prefer to work full-time, for small projects we use individual hours at a slightly higher hourly rate.

I'll be glad to adjust myself to the methodology of your company, for individuals I propose to work based on Sprints which are two-week units of work including: a planning session at the beginning to define the scope, a review at the end of the first week and a demonstration at the end of the second week.

After finishing a Sprint there will be seven days in which the results can be evaluated and bug reports can be submitted for the features covered in that scope, those bugs will be fixed without additional charges and new features and/or out-of-scope modifications will be included on the next Sprint and charged accordingly.

## Contact

You can reach me via email at contact@michael-cetrulo.com to schedule a call, my Skype is samus_uy and my number +598.99.564.670 here in Uruguay.

### Note to recruiters

I'll be glad to receive any offers/proposals you'd like me to consider and I'll review each one however I'll only reply to those I want to discuss further, thank you.

## On the web

Here's some other places where you can find me:

### Professional

* Toptal - [toptal.com/resume/michael-cetrulo](http://www.toptal.com/resume/michael-cetrulo#hire-only-tested-developers)
* LinkedIn - [linkedin.com/in/web2samus](https://www.linkedin.com/in/web2samus)
* Careers - [careers.stackoverflow.com/web2samus](https://careers.stackoverflow.com/web2samus)
* AngelList - [angel.co/michael-cetrulo](https://angel.co/michael-cetrulo)
* Github - [github.com/git2samus](https://github.com/git2samus)
* Bitbucket - [bitbucket.org/git2samus](https://bitbucket.org/git2samus]

### Personal

* Facebook - [facebook.com/fb2samus](https://www.facebook.com/fb2samus)
* Twitter - [twitter.com/gonna_hate](https://twitter.com/gonna_hate)
* Reddit - [reddit.com/user/Samus_](https://www.reddit.com/user/Samus_)
